AppError.defaultErrorMessage: We care about your experience on Kolibri and are working hard to fix this issue
AppError.defaultErrorReportPrompt: Help us by reporting this error
AppError.defaultErrorResolution: Try refreshing this page or going back to the home page
AppError.resourceNotFoundMessage: Sorry, that resource does not exist
CreateLearnerAccountForm.header: Allow learners to join this facility?
CreateLearnerAccountForm.noOptionLabel: No. Admins must create an account for them to join this facility.

DeviceNameForm.deviceNameDescription: Give this device a name that can be easily recognized by you and others you connect with.
ErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalGuidance: If retrying doesn't work, restart the server and refresh the page.
ErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: Please check your server connection and retry.
FacilityNameTextbox.facilityNameFieldMax: Facility name cannot be more than 50 characters
FacilityPermissionsForm.formalDescriptio: Schools and other formal learning contexts.
FacilityPermissionsForm.learningEnvironm: What kind of learning environment is your facility?
FacilityPermissionsForm.nonFormalDescrip: Libraries, orphanages, youth centers, computer labs, and other non-formal learning contexts.
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.fullDeviceDesc: This device will be a fully-featured Kolibri server used by admins, coaches, and learners.
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.learnOnlyDevic: This device will only have the features used by learners, and it will auto-sync with the full device.
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.whatKindOfDevi: What kind of device is this?
GuestAccessForm.changeLater: You can change this in your device settings later.
GuestAccessForm.description: This option allows anyone to view educational materials on Kolibri without needing to make an account
GuestAccessForm.header: Enable users to explore Kolibri without an account?
GuestAccessForm.noOptionLabel: No. Users must have an account to explore Kolibri.
HowAreYouUsingKolibri.groupLearningDescr: This device will need to connect with other devices using Kolibri in schools or other group learning settings.
ImportIndividualUserForm.deviceLimitatio: '{full_name} ({username})' is an admin on '{device}'. This device is limited to features for learners only. Features for coaches and admins will not be available.
'{full_name} ({username})' is a {non_admin_role} on '{device}'. This device is limited to features for learners only. Features for coaches and admins will not be available.

ImportIndividualUserForm.enterCredential: Enter the user credentials of the account you want to import.

JoinOrNewLOD.setUpFacilityTitle: Select a facility setup for this learn-only device
LoadingPage.loadingPageSubheader: Please be patient. Setup may take several minutes
PersonalDataConsentForm.description: If you are setting up Kolibri for other users, you or someone you delegate will need to be responsible for protecting and managing their accounts and personal information.
ReportErrorModal.emailDescription: Contact the support team with your error details and we'll do our best to help.
ReportErrorModal.emailPrompt: Send an email to the developers
ReportErrorModal.forumPostingTips: Include a description of what you were trying to do and what you clicked on when the error appeared.
ReportErrorModal.forumUseTips: Search the community forum to see if others encountered similar issues. If unable to find anything, paste the error details below into a new forum post so we can rectify the error in a future version of Kolibri.
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionL: No. Learners can sign in with just a username.
